com.yantra.yfs.japi

Class YFSException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class YFSException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    All APIs throw this exception. It contains all the error codes and their descriptions in XML format. This can be accessed through the getMessage method.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
